column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I took this medication to alleviate the pressure in my ears.  It's been a little less than a week now, and I am somewhat satisfied.  Although, I did not have trouble sleeping, I had to increase my fluid intake, because I was very thirsty all the time. Therefore I had an increase in urination. I too had cold hands and feet at times. I was jittery the first time I ingested it.  My suggestion would be to eat first before taking, haven't been jittery since.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I just started taking the Entex PSE generic version yesterday.  This medicine alleviated my runny nose, sinus pressure, and sore throat very quickly.  However, I am extremely jittery, have a racing heartbeat, awoke all throughout the night, have cold hands and feet, and feel like I am not myself.  I feel like I am outside of my own body, if that makes any sense.  In terms of the racing heartbeat and anxiousness, I feel like I am taking some of those diet drugs that were dangerous for you that were popular a few years ago.  If you take this drug, know that it works, but the side effects are not fun.
